BACK", "MADE IN VIETNAM", ], seasons: "", sold: false, date: "2023-12-01", }, ]; const categories = [ { id: "1", name: "top", }, { id: "2", name: "bottom", }, { id: "3", name: "jacket", }, { id: "4", name: "shoes", }, { id: "5", name: "accessories", }, ]; const cate = categories.find((c) => c.id === products[0].id_cate); return (
{cate.name.toUpperCase()}
